tool_description: An API showing Bible verse of the day
name: Bible Verse of the Day
title: Bible Verse of the Day

api_list.name: Get Bible Verse of the day
api_list.description: This endpoint will return Bible verse of the day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-verse-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com/verse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-verse-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-verse-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com/verse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-verse-of-the-day.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
